    Mass Effect - The Charon Relay

    Made only for the fans of both tabletop RPG and Mass Effect games, this adaptation is based on the Fantasy AGE system by Green Ronin and is used for Dragon Age, Fantasy AGE, Blue Rose and Titansgrave games.
